GLOBAL HR MANAGER

SUMMARY

A Global HR Professional with 10+ years' progressive experience across industries and geographies.
A unique skillset combination project management , HR business partnering, and building HR programs aligned with business strategy to drive successful results.
Highlights
Microsoft Word, Excel, Project, Visio, Power Point,
SAP, Adobe Acrobat Professional

Drive and roll-out divisional HR processes globally, ensured timely completion, compliance and final submission to corporate: Performance Management Process, Organization Talent Review, and Stock Award Program Nominations etc
Leading Talent Management and Development Process improvements at all major sites with a special focus on Manufacturing head's staff and next level positions.
